nodes.text: Jade was the alias taken by Luke Skywalker when, in 9 ABY, he and Mara Jade were temporarily captured by Imperial forces in Hyllyard City on Myrkr. Jade was supposedly a bounty hunter in the employ of Talon Karrde, and had chased the thief Senni Kiffu in a Skipray Blastboat until both had crashed into the forest. Jade had a swollen, purplish face, thanks to a plant that Mara Jade rubbed on Luke's face, causing him to have an allergic reaction that disguised his true identity.
